text: "White on White" is a song by British singer Danny Williams. It was a top ten hit in the U.S., peaking at No. 9 on the Billboard Hot 100 in 1964. Other versions have been recorded by Nelson Riddle, Rob de Nijs in Dutch, and Peter Beil in German. ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1964) !align="left"|Peak position |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot 100 | style="text- align:center;"|9 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Middle-Road Singles | style="text-align:center;"|3 |} ==References== Category:1964 singles Category:1964 songs Category:Danny Williams (singer) songs Category:United Artists Records singles
title: White on White (song)
